pullRequest.title: :bug: switch default value to empty string
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of the Change
Switches default value from null to empty string. Calling .contains(null) was resulting in a NPE.

Alternate Designs
using StringUtils.EMPTY instead of ""
Unsure what is preferred in this scenario.

Why Should This Be In Core?
Bugfix

Benefits

Possible Drawbacks

Verification Process

Applicable Issues
#668

commit.message: switch default value to empty string

nodes.bodyText: My preference would be to do a null check further on rather than set this to an empty string. I say this because if via the ReST API we set it to null then we easily break the plugin. What do you think @aldebaran30701 ?

commit.message: :bug: add null check to string value
